did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: World War II nurse. Six World War II scrapbooks, including clippings, postcards, brochures, and typed letters home from England and France, where she served as a nurse, circa 1943-45.

bioghist.p: Florence B. Wight was a nurse during World War II in England and France, circa 1943-45. She may have lived in West Springfield, Mass. No other biographical information is available.

scopecontent.p: Six World War II scrapbooks, including clippings, postcards, brochures, and typed letters home from England and France, where she served as a nurse, circa 1943-45.
NOTE: The container list for this collection is available in the Sophia Smith Collection. Please contact us to request a copy.
